Description:
As a vet I want to add consultation note so that record is kept
AC: PATCH notes, visible in history

As system I want to send mail + push so that 95% delivered
AC: delivery logs OK

As an admin I want to create ASV user so that access is given
AC: POST /users role=ASV

As a pet owner I want to cancel my appointment so that the slot is freed
AC: PATCH status=Cancelled

As a pet owner I want to filter clinics by specialty so that I choose the right clinic
AC: multi-select filter
